Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman hit a home run in the first inning
Anthony Volpe hit a grand slam in the third inning
Alex Verdugo scored the first run for the Yankees in the second inning
Will Smith hit a home run for the Dodgers in the fifth inning
Aaron Judge drove in his first run of the Series with an RBI single in the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone won his first World Series game as New York's manager
Anthony Volpe spoke about the pressure being relieved after the Yankees' comeback
Freddie Freeman expressed hope to keep his home run streak going in the next game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a sellout with 49,354 fans in attendance
Anthony Volpe was interviewed by Derek Jeter after the game
Others: The Yankees stopped a seven-game Series losing streak against the Dodgers dating to 1981
The Yankees avoided what would have been their first losing Series sweep since 1976
